### Event Management Services for Overseas Events

* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-04-18T14:00:00 EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-03-22
* **Expected Contract End Date**: [To be determined]

#### [**Procurement Details**](#procurement-details)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Open Bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) (Accord de libre-échange canadien (ALEC))

#### [**Description**](#description)
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of Veterans Affairs (VAC), is [requesting proposals for Event Management Services.] The services will be utilized for overseas events. A detailed description of the required services is outlined in the procurement documentation available on Ariba Discovery. Bids must be submitted electronically in accordance with the instructions outlined in the procurement documentation. The selected contractor will be responsible for providing a range of event management services, including, but not limited to, logistics planning, accommodation arrangements, catering services, and program coordination.
